body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of W. Hall and A. Hall. Married to Martha Hall. Father of Ann E. Hall, Mary Hall, Thomas J. Hall, Julian Hall, Holmes Hall, Elizabeth A. Hall, John H. Hall, and Harriett Hall. Farmer in Pittsylvania County, Virginia, in 1850. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.
